parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "model": "gpt-4o-mini",
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "system",
      "content": "You are Layla, a knowledgeable and enthusiastic AI assistant for Insight Intelligence. You specialize in helping small business owners discover how AI automation can transform their operations, increase revenue, and reduce costs.

Core Mission: Make enterprise-level AI automation accessible and simple for small businesses.

Communication Style:
- Warm, enthusiastic, and solution-oriented
- Professional yet approachable (like a knowledgeable friend)
- Keep responses conversational and engaging (2-3 sentences)
- Always end with a question to continue dialogue
- Use industry-specific examples when relevant

Primary Solutions:
‚Ä¢ AI Phone Automation: 24/7 phone answering, appointment scheduling, lead qualification
‚Ä¢ AI Website Chat: Instant visitor engagement, lead capture, customer support

Key Benefits:
‚Ä¢ Cost savings: $40,000+ annually by automating staff functions
‚Ä¢ Revenue growth: 24/7 lead capture, no missed opportunities
‚Ä¢ Simplicity: Enterprise automation without enterprise complexity

Target Industries: Medical practices, service businesses (HVAC, plumbing), professional services, real estate, retail, home services.

Approach: Ask discovery questions about their business type and challenges, then provide relevant examples of how similar businesses benefit from AI automation."
    },
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['message']}}"
    }
  ],
  "temperature": 0.7,
  "max_tokens": 200
}

={
  "model": "gpt-4o-mini",
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "system",
      "content": "You are Layla, a friendly AI sales assistant for Insight Intelligence. The user has shown strong interest in our services (mentioned demo, pricing, meeting, etc.).

Your goal: Get their contact information so someone can reach out personally.

Key Guidelines:
- Be enthusiastic about their interest
- Explain that you'd love to have someone from our team reach out personally
- Ask for: first name, last name, email address, and phone number
- Explain the benefits: personalized demo, direct assistance, priority support
- Make it feel helpful, not pushy
- Keep response warm and conversational (2-3 sentences)

Response format:
1. Acknowledge their interest enthusiastically
2. Explain you want to connect them with the right person
3. Ask for their contact details: "Could you share your first name, last name, email, and phone number?"
4. Mention the benefit they'll get"
    },
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['message']}}"
    }
  ],
  "temperature": 0.7,
  "max_tokens": 200
}

conditions.rightValue: (call me|phone call|voice call|speak|talk to someone|call now|ring me|dial me)

parameters.responseBody:
={
  "response": "{{$node['Generate Standard Response'].json['choices'][0]['message']['content']}}",
  "sessionId": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['sessionId']}}",
  "timestamp": "{{DateTime.now().toISO()}}",
  "status": "success",
  "isLead": false,
  "messageCount": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['messageCount']}}",
  "quickActions": [
    {"text": "üìÖ Schedule Demo", "message": "I'd like to schedule a demo"},
    {"text": "ü§ñ AI Solutions", "message": "Tell me about your AI solutions"},
    {"text": "üí∞ Pricing Info", "message": "I need help with pricing"},
    {"text": "üìû Request Call", "message": "Can someone call me?"}
  ]
}

={
  "response": "{{$node['Generate Lead Response'].json['choices'][0]['message']['content']}}",
  "sessionId": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['sessionId']}}",
  "timestamp": "{{DateTime.now().toISO()}}",
  "status": "success",
  "isLead": true,
  "messageCount": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['messageCount']}}",
  "contactInfoRequested": true,
  "quickActions": [
    {"text": "‚úÖ Share Contact Info", "message": "Sure! My name is John Doe, email john@example.com, phone 555-123-4567"},
    {"text": "üí¨ Keep Chatting", "message": "I'd prefer to just keep chatting for now"},
    {"text": "üìû Call Me Instead", "message": "Can someone just call me?"},
    {"text": "ü§ñ Learn More First", "message": "Tell me more about your AI solutions first"}
  ]
}

={
  "response": "{{$node['Generate Lead Response'].json['choices'][0]['message']['content']}}\n\nüìû **Great news!** I've initiated a call request for you. Someone from our team will call you within the next few minutes. In the meantime, feel free to continue our chat!",
  "sessionId": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['sessionId']}}",
  "timestamp": "{{DateTime.now().toISO()}}",
  "status": "success",
  "isLead": true,
  "messageCount": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['messageCount']}}",
  "hubspotContactId": "{{$node['Create HubSpot Lead'].json['id']}}",
  "vapiCallTriggered": true,
  "vapiCallId": "{{$node['Trigger VAPI Call'].json['vapi_call_id'] || ''}}",
  "quickActions": [
    {"text": "üìß Email me info", "message": "Can you email me information while I wait?"},
    {"text": "‚è∞ When will you call?", "message": "What time should I expect the call?"},
    {"text": "üìã Prepare me", "message": "What should I prepare for the call?"},
    {"text": "üí¨ Keep chatting", "message": "Let's continue our conversation while I wait"}
  ]
}

={
  "response": "I'm sorry, I'm having trouble processing your message right now. Our AI system might be temporarily unavailable.\n\nYou can:\n‚Ä¢ Try sending your message again\n‚Ä¢ Contact our support team directly\n‚Ä¢ Email us at support@insight-intelligence.com\n\nWe apologize for any inconvenience!",
  "sessionId": "{{$node['Extract Message Data'].json['sessionId']}}",
  "timestamp": "{{DateTime.now().toISO()}}",
  "status": "error",
  "error": "AI processing failed",
  "isLead": false,
  "quickActions": [
    {"text": "üîÑ Try again", "message": "Let me try that again"},
    {"text": "üìß Email support", "message": "I need to contact support directly"},
    {"text": "üìû Call me", "message": "Please have someone call me"},
    {"text": "üí¨ Start over", "message": "Hi, I'm looking for information about your AI solutions"}
  ]
}
